refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A videoobject is a wrapper containing videodata and its associated meta-information.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: May be formatted inline or as a displayed block, depending on context. It might not be rendered at all, depending on its placement within a mediaobject or inlinemediaobject and the constraints on the publishing system. For a more detailed description of the semantics involved, see mediaobject.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.para: DocBook V5.1 introduces new controls providing greater control over the features of the media player in environments like a web browser.
DocBook V5.1 also introduces the possibility of having more than one videodata in a videoobject.
